name: 2021 International Conference on Computer Systems
content: Publicationï¼š The accepted papers of ICCS 2021 will be published in ICBDT 2021 Conference Proceedings as a Special Chapter. The proceedings will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series, which will be archived in the Online Digital Library , and indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
